text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump is a dangerous madman.  

"The director of the federal agency responsible for developing a coronavirus vaccine was removed after pressing for rigorous vetting of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine to treat the coronavirus, which Trump has repeatedly embraced."  - WTFJHT
